rule.condition: nullsub(status in $L.file, "")~={"DEADLINE ALERT", "closed", "resolved"} and flag in $L.file=true
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: nullsub(status in $L.file, "")~={"DEADLINE ALERT", "closed", "resolved"} and flag in $L.file=true)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"nullsub(status in $L.file, "")~={"DEADLINE ALERT", "closed", "resolved"} and flag in $L.file=true"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Alert Status via JavaScript (when ( Expression: nullsub(status in $L.file, "")~={"DEADLINE ALERT", "closed", "resolved"} and flag in $L.file=true))
